message.name: ERR_TXN_COMMIT_PENDING_VERIFICATIONS
message.locale: Transaction cannot be successfully completed as there are pending evidence records for verification engine to process.

message.name: ERR_DEFERRED_VERIFICATION_EVIDENCE_QUEUED_BEFORE_DEFER
message.locale: Attempt to queue evidence records without configuring deferred verification.

message.name: ERR_DEFERRED_VERIFICATION_TRIGGER_BEFORE_DEFER
message.locale: Deferred verification cannot be triggered even before configuring the same.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_DEFERRED_MULTIPLE_TIMES
message.locale: Attempt to defer verification more than once within the same transaction without processing previous pending evidence records.

message.name: ERR_ATTACHMENT_INFO_NO_SUITABLE_CODE
message.locale: The document cannot be processed for this verification, because the type is either missing or not of a suitable type to meet the verification requirements. Please reject this document.
